testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: We are proud of the trust of over 200 clients we serve daily

1.name: Saud Al-Qahtani
1.text: I've dealt with many printers, but your offset color accuracy is next level. The brochures turned out amazing.

2.name: Noura Al-Shammari
2.text: You saved me in a very tight deadline! The exhibition booth and banners were ready in less than 24 hours with exceptional quality.

3.name: Eng. Ahmed Al-Ghamdi
3.text: The 3D signage gave a luxurious look to our new HQ. Installation was very clean and detailed. A true success partner.

4.name: Laila Al-Salem
4.text: As a designer, color matching is crucial. Your UV printing tech is excellent and colors are incredibly vivid.

5.name: Khalid Al-Otaibi
5.text: The coffee cups and stickers quality is high and doesn't peel with heat. Bless your business.

6.name: Fahad Al-Dossari
6.text: Very competitive prices for the quality. We ordered large quantities of stamps and invoices, everything arrived perfectly.

7.name: Dr. Sarah Al-Omari
7.text: The internal signage in the clinic looks very elegant and modern. Laser cutting is precise with zero errors.

8.name: Omar Ba-Hussain
8.text: Your customer service is a lesson to be learned. Patience with edits until we reached the goal. Very happy.

9.name: Mona Al-Juaid
9.text: DTF printing on t-shirts is very stable even after washing. Print texture is excellent. Will definitely order again.

10.name: Yasser Al-Harbi
10.text: The brochures for our new project were an honorable front for us before investors. Thanks for the professionalism.

about.title: Crafting Your Identity
about.description: Modern Design Company was established in late 2017 with a small team and a clear vision. Our vision has helped us overcome numerous challenges, and most importantly, we have been able to achieve many successes by firmly believing that the key to our success lies in our commitment to establishing ourselves as a specialized group that delivers creative projects and high-quality work. We have full confidence that our entire team shares this vision and works towards implementing it in all our daily activities.
about.why_description: Because we believe quality is not a coincidence. We combine machine precision with artist passion to deliver a product that steals the show.

footer.bio: We provide creative solutions in design and advertising with the highest standards of quality and professionalism.
